name: Andromeda-X82
description:
Andromeda-X82

The year is 2500 and humanity has spread far amongst the stars. In the corner of the galaxy Andromeda lies outpost X82. This is the location of your new jobsite as a meteor defense coordinator. Don't worry, it's not too hard, just aim the gun, shoot the rocks out of the sky, and let your phase shields take care of the debris. Unfortunately, this quadrant of the galaxy seems particularly prone to lots of meteors.  Good luck I guess.

Gameplay Features

  • Use your laser to break up meteors
  • Shield rotates around planet to catch meteors you missed
  • Balance the usage of your shield and laser's charge
  • Every in-game year you can get upgrades for your shield and laser
